alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 01 at 12:39PM EST until January 01 at 1:15PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... East central Logan County in south central Kentucky... Northwestern Simpson County in south central Kentucky... Central Warren County in south central Kentucky... * Until 1215 PM CST. * At 1138 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles east of Russellville, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Memphis Junction and Crestmoor around 1150 AM CST. Plum Springs and Mount Victor around 1155 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this tornadic thunderstorm include Bowling Green. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
